mapper.select: SELECT t2.user_id AS `value`, t3.username AS `label` FROM devops_product_line t1 LEFT JOIN devops_product_line_user t2 ON t1.id = t2.product_line_id LEFT JOIN system_user t3 ON t2.user_id = t3.user_id WHERE t3.enabled = 1 AND t1.available = 1 AND t1.id = #{productLineId} AND t2.role_code = #{roleCode}
